snippet: Gov. Chris Christie, whose earlier picks for the Supreme Court were rejected by the State Senate, said the qualifications for his new choices were beyond question.
abstract: Gov Chris Christie nominates Robert M Hanna, commissioner of New Jersey's Bureau of Public Utilities, and State Superior Court Judge David Bauman to fill longstanding vacancies on the New Jersey Supreme Court; Christie, who has made no secret of his desire to change the makeup of a court he sees as overly activist and liberal, has been arguing with the Democratic-led Senate for two years over nominees to the court.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Chris Christie, whose earlier picks for the Supreme Court were rejected by the State Senate, said the qualifications for his new choices were beyond question.

headline.seo: Christie Nominates 2 Justices for New Jersey Supreme Court
headline.main: Governor Nominates 2 for New Jersey’s Top Court
headline.print_headline: 2 Nominated to New Jersey’s Top Court
